name: Divine Souls (itch)
description:
Divine Souls is an action top-down RPG where portal traversal is key in dominating the world. You are tasked by the overload to dominate these new worlds by defeating powerful enemies and collecting their divine souls in order to replenish your overload's energy.

World Exploration

Explore an ominous dungeon world that's full of traps and puzzles. On your journey be mindful of your surroundings as you will find  traps and enemies waiting for you. Do NOT fail your overlord locate all the divine souls.

 Battles

While in battle use your crossbow to shoot enemies from afar but when it gets too close for comfort use your sword. When health gets too low do not be afraid to risk it all for a finishing blow!

 Most enemies you see will not hesitate to kill! You must be smart and agile to dodge incoming attacks and never hesitate to make the first move.

Key Features: 

Fast and juicy battles 

unique artwork 

Challenging enemies 

30 minutes of intense gameplay
